verses.verse: Then <S%H7891>sang<s%> <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> and <S%H1301>Barak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H42>Abinoam<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
<S%H1288>Praise<s%> you the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for the <S%H6544>avenging<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, when the <S%H5971>people<s%> willingly offered <S%H5068>themselves<s%>.

<S%H8085>Hear<s%>, O you <S%H4428>kings<s%>; give <S%H238>ear<s%>, O you <S%H7336>princes<s%>; <S%H7891>I<s%>, even I, will sing unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> praise to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

<S%H3068>Lord<s%>, when you went <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, when you marched <S%H6805>out<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>, the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7493>trembled<s%>, and the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H5197>dropped<s%>, the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> also <S%H5197>dropped<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>.

The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H5140>melted<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, even that <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

In the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8044>Shamgar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6067>Anath<s%>, in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3278>Jael<s%>, the <S%H734>highways<s%> were <S%H2308>unoccupied<s%>, and the <S%H1980>travelers<s%> <S%H3212>walked<s%> through <S%H6128>byways<s%>.

The inhabitants of the <S%H6520>villages<s%> <S%H2308>ceased<s%>, they <S%H2308>ceased<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, until that I <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, that I <S%H6965>arose<s%> a <S%H517>mother<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

They <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>; then was <S%H3901>war<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates<s%>: was there a <S%H4043>shield<s%> or <S%H7420>spear<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> among <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?

My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is toward the <S%H2710>governors<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that offered themselves <S%H5068>willingly<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%>. <S%H1288>Bless<s%> you the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
<S%H7878>Speak<s%>, you that <S%H7392>ride<s%> on <S%H6715>white<s%> <S%H860>donkeys<s%>, you that <S%H3427>sit<s%> in <S%H4055>judgment<s%>, and <S%H1980>walk<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>.

They that are delivered from the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H2686>archers<s%> in the places of drawing <S%H4857>water<s%>, there shall they <S%H8567>rehearse<s%> the righteous <S%H6666>acts<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, even the righteous <S%H6666>acts<s%> toward the inhabitants of his <S%H6520>villages<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: then shall the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H8179>gates<s%>.

<S%H5782>Awake<s%>, <S%H5782>awake<s%>, <S%H1683>Deborah<s%>: <S%H5782>awake<s%>, <S%H5782>awake<s%>, <S%H1696>utter<s%> a <S%H7892>song<s%>: <S%H6965>arise<s%>, <S%H1301>Barak<s%>, and lead your <S%H7628>captivity<s%> <S%H7617>captive<s%>, you <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H42>Abinoam<s%>.

Then he made him that <S%H8300>remains<s%> have <S%H7287>dominion<s%> over the <S%H117>nobles<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%>: the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> made me have <S%H7287>dominion<s%> over the <S%H1368>mighty<s%>.

Out of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> was there a <S%H8328>root<s%> of them against <S%H6002>Amalek<s%>; <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1144>you<s%>, Benjamin, among your <S%H5971>people<s%>; out of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H2710>governors<s%>, and out of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> they that <S%H4900>handle<s%> the <S%H7626>pen<s%> of the <S%H5608>writer<s%>.

And the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> were with <S%H1683>Deborah<s%>; even <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, and also <S%H1301>Barak<s%>: he was <S%H7971>sent<s%> on <S%H7272>foot<s%> into the <S%H6010>valley<s%>. For the <S%H6390>divisions<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> there were <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2711>thoughts<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

Why <S%H3427>lived<s%> you <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H4942>sheepfolds<s%>, to <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8292>bleatings<s%> of the <S%H5739>flocks<s%>? For the <S%H6390>divisions<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> there were <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2714>searchings<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

<S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H7931>lived<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>: and why did <S%H1835>Dan<s%> <S%H1481>remain<s%> in <S%H591>ships<s%>? <S%H836>Asher<s%> <S%H3427>continued<s%> on the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2348>shore<s%>, and <S%H7931>lived<s%> in his <S%H4664>breaches<s%>.

<S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> were a <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H2778>jeoparded<s%> their <S%H5315>lives<s%> unto the <S%H4191>death<s%> in the high <S%H4791>places<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>.

The <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%>, then <S%H3898>fought<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> in <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> by the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%>; they <S%H3947>took<s%> no <S%H1215>gain<s%> of <S%H3701>money<s%>.
They <S%H3898>fought<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; the <S%H3556>stars<s%> in their <S%H4546>courses<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H5516>Sisera<s%>.

The <S%H5158>river<s%> of <S%H7028>Kishon<s%> swept them <S%H1640>away<s%>, that <S%H6917>ancient<s%> <S%H5158>river<s%>, the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H7028>Kishon<s%>. O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, you have trodden <S%H1869>down<s%> <S%H5797>strength<s%>.
Then were the <S%H6119>horsehoofs<s%> <S%H1986>broken<s%> by the means of the <S%H1726>prancings<s%>, the <S%H1726>prancings<s%> of their mighty <S%H47>ones<s%>.

<S%H779>Curse<s%> you <S%H4789>Meroz<s%>, <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H779>curse<s%> you <S%H779>bitterly<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> <S%H935>there<s%>; because they came not to the <S%H5833>help<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, to the <S%H5833>help<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> against the <S%H1368>mighty<s%>.

<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> above <S%H802>women<s%> shall <S%H3278>Jael<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H2268>Heber<s%> the <S%H7017>Kenite<s%> <S%H1288>be<s%>, blessed shall she be above <S%H802>women<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%>.
He <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>, and she <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H2461>milk<s%>; she brought <S%H7126>forth<s%> <S%H2529>butter<s%> in a <S%H117>lordly<s%> <S%H5602>dish<s%>.

She <S%H7971>put<s%> her <S%H3027>hand<s%> to the <S%H3489>nail<s%>, and her right <S%H3225>hand<s%> to the <S%H6001>workmen<s%>'s <S%H1989>hammer<s%>; and with the hammer she <S%H1986>struck<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%>, she struck <S%H4277>off<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%>, when she had <S%H4272>pierced<s%> and struck <S%H2498>through<s%> his <S%H7541>temples<s%>.

At her <S%H7272>feet<s%> he <S%H3766>bowed<s%>, he <S%H5307>fell<s%>, he lay <S%H7901>down<s%>: at her <S%H7272>feet<s%> he <S%H3766>bowed<s%>, he <S%H5307>fell<s%>: <S%H834>where<s%> he <S%H3766>bowed<s%>, there he fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H7703>dead<s%>.

The <S%H517>mother<s%> of <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> <S%H8259>looked<s%> out at a <S%H2474>window<s%>, and <S%H2980>cried<s%> through the <S%H822>lattice<s%>, Why is his <S%H7393>chariot<s%> so <S%H954>long<s%> in <S%H935>coming<s%>? Why <S%H309>wait<s%> the <S%H6471>wheels<s%> of his <S%H4818>chariots<s%>?
Her <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H8282>ladies<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7725>her<s%>, Yes, she returned answer to <S%H561>herself<s%>,

Have they not <S%H4672>found<s%>? have they not <S%H2505>divided<s%> the <S%H7998>prey<s%>; to <S%H7218>every<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> a <S%H7356>girl<s%> or <S%H7361>two<s%>; to <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> a <S%H7998>prey<s%> of various <S%H6648>colors<s%>, a <S%H7998>prey<s%> of various <S%H6648>colors<s%> of <S%H7553>needlework<s%>, of various <S%H6648>colors<s%> of needlework on both <S%H7553>sides<s%>, meet for the <S%H6677>necks<s%> of them that take the <S%H7998>plunder<s%>?

So let all your <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: but let them that <S%H157>love<s%> him be as the <S%H8121>sun<s%> when he goes <S%H3318>forth<s%> in his <S%H1369>might<s%>. And the <S%H776>land<s%> had <S%H8252>rest<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.
